reviewText: How can you go wrong with a Patrick Swayze collection like come on! It's perfect and at such a great price for three amazing movies! Don't even question it just buy it. You know you want to.
Excellent. Discs are in excellent condition. I'm very pleased.  Thank you!
I enjoyed roadhouse very much with all the action and all the ideas to clean up the night club. I always enjoy Patrick Swayze in films and also like Sam Elliot and teamed up their the best
The best thing ever, these movies are so, so, so awesome. Patrick Swayze is the best, everything he was in should've won an award.
I ordered this for my son for Christmas.  He has watched it many times already and just loves it.  He would recommend it to others.

This is a nice collection of 3 DVDs with some of his older works on it.  Youngblood is about a high school boy from the USA wanting to be a professional hockey player.  Swayze's role in this one is supportive.  Red Dawn is about a group of teens, led by young adult Swayze, who survive WWIII by camping in the mountains.  This is his first film with Jennifer Gray.  It is full of explosions, machine guns, and crashes.  It is not a romance, but it does show some caring between Swayze and Grey as her character dies.  It's a tear jerker at the end.  Roadhouse is an action packed film about Dalton (Swayze), a professional bar cooler, who is hired to clean up a bar infested with drug dealers, prostitutes, and people who love to get into brawls. This is a film in which he gets to show off his martial arts skills.  Lots of fighting, shooting, explosions, and blood.  There is also a romance between Dalton and the town's lady doctor, to the rage of the local crime boss who wants her and the town for himself.
its absulutly great and i had alot of fun and i enjoyd very much to watch it.
